activities: Unity Technologies receives personal information 1) relating to employees of its affiliates located in the EU/EEA and 2) from customers, website visitors and game players located in the EU/EEA in order for Unity to provide its products and services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human resources data for Unity employees to whom Unity renders employee related services. Off-line, on-line, manually processed human resources data.  Online and offline personal information from customers, website visitors and game players.
recoursemech:
JAMS for client data
EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
